package-manager.name: depot
package-manager.title: GNU Groff document formatting system
package-manager.description: This is the GNU groff document formatting system. Groff (GNU Troff) is a document processor which reads plain text mixed with formatting commands and produces formatted output. The Groff package contains the traditional UNIX text formatting tools troff, nroff, tbl, eqn, and pic. Output can be produced in a number of formats including plain ASCII and PostScript.
